Swept Disk Solid PolyCurve Directrix
====================================



```
concept {
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:Directrix -> IfcIndexedPolyCurve
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:Radius -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:InnerRadius -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:StartParam -> IfcParameterValue_0
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:EndParam -> IfcParameterValue_1
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:StyledByItem -> IfcStyledItem:Item
    IfcIndexedPolyCurve:Points -> IfcCartesianPointList3D
    IfcIndexedPolyCurve:Segments -> IfcArcIndex
    IfcIndexedPolyCurve:Segments -> IfcLineIndex
    IfcStyledItem:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyle
    IfcStyledItem:Name -> IfcLabel
}
```
